items.name: Sentari's Answer
explicitMods: Curse Enemies with Punishment when you Block their Melee Damage, ignoring Curse Limit
Curse Enemies with Temporal Chains when you Block their Projectile Attack Damage, ignoring Curse Limit
Curse Enemies with Elemental Weakness when you Block their Spell Damage, ignoring Curse Limit
flavourText: Open your eyes and you will see the cracks in your enemy's walls.
Open your mind and you will see the cracks in your enemy's plans.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Reserves mana to apply a buff and leave afterimages of your recent past. Cast the spell again to return to the oldest afterimage, teleporting to that location as well as resetting your Life, Mana and Energy Shield to the values they had then.
explicitMods: This Spell's Cast Speed cannot be modified
Buff makes you Unaffected by Temporal Chains
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: The Ascetic
explicitMods: 99% increased Rarity of Items found with a Normal Item Equipped
15% increased Quantity of Items found with a Magic Item Equipped
flavourText: Many things come to one who has nothing.

items.name: Ventor's Gamble
flavourText: In a blaze of glory,
An anomaly defying all odds
The "unkillable" beast met the divine
And Ventor met his latest trophy.

items.typeLine: Synthesised Dragon's Regicide Mask of Janus
craftedMods: 45% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Slain Rare or Unique Enemies

properties.name: Critical, Spell, AoE, Duration, Vaal, Physical

socketedItems.secDescrText: This spell creates ethereal blades which orbit in an area around you, dealing damage every 0.6 seconds to all enemies in their radius. As more blades are added, the damage becomes greater and more frequent.
explicitMods: 35% increased Hit Rate for each blade
Can have up to 10 active spinning blades
10% increased Critical Strike Chance for each blade
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Modifiers to Skill Effect Duration also apply to this Skill's Soul Gain Prevention
hybrid.secDescrText: Creates an independently-moving vortex of ethereal blades which lasts for a duration. The vortex moves toward nearby enemies, repeatedly damaging enemies that it passes through.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies. If enemies are left below 10% of maximum life after being hit by these skills, they will be killed.
explicitMods: Kill Enemies that have 10% Life or lower when Hit by Supported Skills
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Greed's Embrace
flavourText: Some would question if the risk was worth it.
The rest were already dead.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Ethereal weapons rain from the sky, dealing damage to enemies in a sequence of volleys, each wider but less damaging than the last. Enemies can be hit multiple times where these overlap.
explicitMods: Leaves a Lingering Blade in the ground for every Volley
Leaves 50% fewer Lingering Blades in the ground if you don't Cast this Spell yourself
20% reduced Critical Strike Chance per Volley
Maximum 40 Lingering Blades can be left in the ground at a time
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports spell skills that apply an effect to an area around a targeted location. Cannot support Vaal skills or skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Cannot modify the skills of minions.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 10% increased Area of Effect

Supported Area of Effect Skills also affect areas in front of and behind the targeted area

socketedItems.secDescrText: Unleashes a vile contagion on enemies, dealing chaos damage over time. If an enemy dies while affected by Contagion, it spreads to other enemies.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Targets an allied player to apply a buff which links you to them for a duration. While linked, their hits can trigger your supported spells. If the target dies while linked, you will also die. This skill cannot be triggered, or used by Totems, Traps, or Mines.
explicitMods: Triggers a Supported Spell from Linked target's location when they Hit an Enemy

Link breaks if target leaves range or line of sight for 4 seconds
Maximum 1 Link from any source per target
You die if Linked target dies
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Supported Spells are Triggered by Intuitive Link
hybrid.secDescrText: Supports spell skills, causing them to be triggered by Intuitive Link. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.

items.name: Perandus Blazon
explicitMods: -2 Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits
flavourText: A large enough debt turns even a friend
into an enemy, and the Perandus family
had more debtors than anyone.

explicitMods: Adds 4 to 8 Fire Damage to Attacks
Adds 1 to 13 Lightning Damage to Attacks
flavourText: Wealth unspent is wealth wasted.

items.name: Taste of Hate
explicitMods: 15% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Cold Damage during Effect
Gain 11% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage during effect
30% chance to Avoid being Chilled during Effect
30% chance to Avoid being Frozen during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A sip will freeze your lips,
A swig will chill your heart,
A glass will still your soul.

implicitMods: Adds 30 to 59 Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that protects the lower half of your life, preventing some of the immediate life loss when damaged by hits and applying the loss over time instead. Your life cannot be raised above low life other than by flasks, and while above low life, skills will cost life as well as mana.
explicitMods:
Life Recovery other than Flasks cannot Recover Life to above Low Life
When taking Damage from Hits, 45% of Life loss below half Life is Prevented, then 150% of Life loss prevented this way is lost over 4 seconds
Skills gain a Base Life Cost equal to 40% of Base Mana Cost while not on Low Life
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Draws out your own blood to power a buff for a duration, letting this skill inflict the Corrupting Blood debuff on enemies you hit, dealing physical damage over time for a short secondary duration. The buff's duration will be refreshed if you spend enough life before it expires.
explicitMods: Deals 72.7 Base Physical Damage per second
Buff Duration is refreshed after you spend a total of 77 Life
